reg_pit.title: Retention of Fees for Liquor Training Programs Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 174/2017, effective March 31, 2019.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Retention of Fees for Liquor Training Programs Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: A person approved under section 184 (2) of the Liquor Control and Licensing Regulation to provide a training program prescribed under section 60 of the Liquor Control and Licensing Act who collects the fee prescribed under that Act for that training program is authorized to retain the fee as remuneration for all services performed.
This regulation is repealed on March 31, 2019.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Financial Administration Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 138, section 14]
